00066 class QtArgIface {
00067 
00068     friend class QtArgCmdLine;

00070     public:

00074         typedef QList< QChar > FlagsList;

00088             ,   m_names( names )
00089         {}

00270 inline QString
00271 QtArgIface::getUsageString( const NamesList & namesList ) const
00272 {
00273     QString usage;
00274 
00275     if( flags().size() )
00276     {
00277         usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags );
00278         usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::flagMarker );
00279 
00280         foreach( QChar f, flags() )
00281             usage.append( f );
00282     }
00283 
00284     if( names().size() )
00285     {
00286         if( flags().size() )
00287             usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags );
00288         else
00289             usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames );
00290 
00291         bool first = true;
00292 
00293         foreach( QString name, names() )
00294         {
00295             if( !first )
00296                 usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::namesSeparator );
00297             else
00298                 first = false;
00299 
00300             usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::nameMarker );
00301             markUnrequiredPartOfTheName( name, namesList );
00302             usage.append( name );
00303         }
00304 
00305         if( isWithValue() )
00306             usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue );
00307     }
00308     else
00309         if( isWithValue() )
00310             usage.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue );
00311 
00312     return usage;
00313 }
00314 
00315 inline QString
00316 QtArgIface::getHelpString( const NamesList & namesList ) const
00317 {
00318     QString help = getUsageString( namesList );
00319     help.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00320     help.append( description() );
00321     help.append( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00322 
00323     return help;
00324 }

00769 inline
00770 QtArg::QtArg(
00771     const QChar & flag,
00772     const QString & name,
00773     const QString & description,
00774     bool required,
00775     bool withValue,
00776     QtArgVisitorIface * visitor,
00777     QtArgConstraintIface * constraint )
00778         :   QtArgIface( name.length() ?
00779                 QtArgIface::NamesList() << name : QtArgIface::NamesList(),
00780                 QtArgIface::FlagsList() << flag )
00781         ,   m_description( description )
00782         ,   m_required( required )
00783         ,   m_withValue( withValue )
00784         ,   m_defined( false )
00785         ,   m_present( false )
00786         ,   m_visitor( visitor )
00787         ,   m_constraint( constraint )
00788 {
00789     m_args << this;
00790 
00791     if( !isWithValue() )
00792     {
00793         setValue( QVariant( false ) );
00794         setDefined( false );
00795     }
00796 }

00952 inline QtArg &
00953 QtArg::operator = ( const QtArg & arg )
00954 {
00955     if( this != &arg )
00956     {
00957         m_flags = arg.m_flags;
00958         m_names = arg.m_names;
00959         m_description = arg.m_description;
00960         m_required = arg.m_required;
00961         m_withValue = arg.m_withValue;
00962         m_visitor = arg.m_visitor;
00963         m_defined = arg.m_defined;
00964         m_present = arg.m_present;
00965         m_value = arg.m_value;
00966         m_constraint = arg.m_constraint;
00967     }
00968 
00969     return *this;
00970 }

01140 inline QtArgIface *
01141 QtArg::giveArgument( const QChar & f )
01142 {
01143     if( !m_flags.isEmpty() )
01144         foreach( QChar flag, m_flags )
01145             if( flag == f )
01146                 return this;
01147 
01148     return NULL;
01149 }
01150 
01151 inline QtArgIface *
01152 QtArg::giveArgument( const QString & n )
01153 {
01154     if( m_names.size() )
01155         foreach( QString name, m_names )
01156             if( name.startsWith( n ) )
01157                 return this;
01158 
01159     return NULL;
01160 }
01161 
01162 inline const QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList &
01163 QtArg::arguments() const
01164 {
01165     return m_args;
01166 }
01167 
01168 inline void
01169 QtArg::check(
01170     const QChar & delimiter,
01171     QtArgIface::FlagsList & alreadyKnownFlags,
01172     QtArgIface::NamesList & alreadyKnownNames ) const
01173 {
01174     if( m_flags.isEmpty() && m_names.isEmpty() )
01175         throw QtArgNotDefinedNorNameNorFlagEx();
01176 
01177     if( m_flags.size() )
01178     {
01179         foreach( QChar flag, m_flags )
01180         {
01181             if( delimiter == flag || !flag.isLetterOrNumber() )
01182                 throw QtArgDissallowedFlagOrNameEx(
01183                     QString::fromLatin1( "Dissallowed flag: \"%1\"." )
01184                         .arg( flag ) );
01185 
01186             if( alreadyKnownFlags.contains( flag ) )
01187                 throw QtArgNameOrFlagAlreadyKnownEx(
01188                     QString::fromLatin1( "Flag already in use: %1." )
01189                         .arg( flag ) );
01190 
01191             alreadyKnownFlags.append( flag );
01192         }
01193     }
01194 
01195     if( m_names.size() )
01196     {
01197         foreach( QString name, m_names )
01198         {
01199             if( name.isEmpty() ||
01200                 name.contains( QRegExp( QLatin1String( "\\s" ) ) ) )
01201                     throw QtArgDissallowedFlagOrNameEx(
01202                         QString::fromLatin1( "Dissallowed name: \"%1\"." )
01203                             .arg( name ) );
01204 
01205             if( alreadyKnownNames.contains( name ) )
01206                 throw QtArgNameOrFlagAlreadyKnownEx(
01207                     QString::fromLatin1( "Name already in use: %1." )
01208                         .arg( name ) );
01209 
01210             alreadyKnownNames.append( name );
01211         }
01212     }
01213 }
01214 
01215 inline void
01216 QtArg::check() const
01217 {
01218     if( !isDefined() )
01219     {
01220         if( isRequired() && !isPresent() )
01221             throw QtArgNotDefinedMandatoryArgumentEx(
01222                 QString::fromLatin1( "Not defined mandatory argument: %1" )
01223                     .arg( names().size() ? names().front() : flags().front() ) );
01224 
01225         if( isPresent() && isWithValue() )
01226             throw QtArgNotDefinedOptionForTheArgumentEx(
01227                 QString::fromLatin1( "Not defined value of the argument: %1" )
01228                     .arg( names().size() ? names().front() : flags().front() ) );
01229     }
01230 }
01231 
01232 inline int
01233 QtArg::process( QtArgCmdLineContext & context )
01234 {
01235     if( isWithValue() )
01236     {
01237         if( !context.atEnd() )
01238         {
01239             setValue( context.next() );
01240 
01241             return 1;
01242         }
01243         else
01244             setPresent();
01245     }
01246     else
01247         setValue( QVariant( true ) );
01248 
01249     return 0;
01250 }
01251 
01252 inline void
01253 QtArg::visit( QtArgCmdLineContext & context )
01254 {
01255     if( visitor() ) visitor()->visit( context );
01256 }
01257 
01258 inline void
01259 QtArg::checkConstraint() const
01260 {
01261     if( m_constraint && isDefined() )
01262         if( !m_constraint->check( m_value ) )
01263             throw QtArgContraintNotObservedEx(
01264                 QString::fromLatin1( "Constraint for the argument: %1"
01265                 " hasn't observed. Wrong value is: %2" )
01266                     .arg( names().size() ? names().front() : flags().front() )
01267                     .arg( m_value.toString() ) );
01268 }
01269 
01270 
01271 namespace /* anonymous */ {
01272 
01273     inline bool
01274     isNamesEqual( const QtArgIface::NamesList & l1,
01275         const QtArgIface::NamesList & l2 )
01276     {
01277         if( l1.size() == l2.size() )
01278         {
01279             foreach( QString name, l1 )
01280                 if( !l2.contains( name ) )
01281                     return false;
01282         }
01283         else
01284             return false;
01285 
01286         return true;
01287     }
01288 
01289     inline bool
01290     isFlagsEqual( const QtArgIface::FlagsList & f1,
01291         const QtArgIface::FlagsList & f2 )
01292     {
01293         if( f1.size() == f2.size() )
01294         {
01295             foreach( QChar flag, f1 )
01296                 if( !f2.contains( flag ) )
01297                     return false;
01298         }
01299         else
01300             return false;
01301 
01302         return true;
01303     }
01304 
01305 } /* namespace anonymous */
01306 
01307 inline bool operator == ( const QtArg & a1, const QtArg & a2 )
01308 {
01309     if( a1.m_flags.isEmpty() && a2.m_flags.isEmpty() )
01310         return isNamesEqual( a1.m_names, a2.m_names );
01311     else if( !a1.m_flags.isEmpty() && !a2.m_flags.isEmpty() )
01312     {
01313         if( isFlagsEqual( a1.m_flags, a2.m_flags ) )
01314             return isNamesEqual( a1.m_names, a2.m_names );
01315         else
01316             return false;
01317     }
01318     else
01319         return false;
01320 }
01321 
01322 inline bool operator != ( const QtArg & a1, const QtArg & a2 )
01323 {
01324     return !( a1 == a2 );
01325 }

01328 {
01329     QtArg tmp = a1;
01330     tmp.setName( a2 );
01331 
01332     return ( a1 == tmp );
01333 }
